an7.51:4.3: katamo ca so, bhikkhave, saṃyogo visaṃyogo dhammapariyāyo?
an7.51:5.1: Itthī, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ itthindriyaṃ manasi karoti—
an7.51:5.2: itthikuttaṃ itthākappaṃ itthividhaṃ itthicchandaṃ itthissaraṃ itthālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:5.4: Sā tattha rattā tatrābhiratā bahiddhā purisindriyaṃ manasi karoti—
an7.51:5.5: purisakuttaṃ purisākappaṃ purisavidhaṃ purisacchandaṃ purisassaraṃ purisālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:5.7: Sā tattha rattā tatrābhiratā bahiddhā saṃyogaṃ ākaṅkhati.
an7.51:5.8: Yañcassā saṃyogapaccayā uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ tañca ākaṅkhati.
an7.51:5.9: Itthatte, bhikkhave, abhiratā sattā purisesu saṃyogaṃ gatā.
an7.51:5.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, itthī itthattaṃ nātivattati.
an7.51:6.1: Puriso, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ purisindriyaṃ manasi karoti—
an7.51:6.2: purisakuttaṃ purisākappaṃ purisavidhaṃ purisacchandaṃ purisassaraṃ purisālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:6.4: So tattha ratto tatrābhirato bahiddhā itthindriyaṃ manasi karoti—
an7.51:6.5: itthikuttaṃ itthākappaṃ itthividhaṃ itthicchandaṃ itthissaraṃ itthālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:6.7: So tattha ratto tatrābhirato bahiddhā saṃyogaṃ ākaṅkhati.
an7.51:6.8: Yañcassa saṃyogapaccayā uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ tañca ākaṅkhati.
an7.51:6.9: Purisatte, bhikkhave, abhiratā sattā itthīsu saṃyogaṃ gatā.
an7.51:6.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puriso purisattaṃ nātivattati.
an7.51:7.2: Itthī, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ itthindriyaṃ na manasi karoti—
an7.51:7.3: itthikuttaṃ itthākappaṃ itthividhaṃ itthicchandaṃ itthissaraṃ itthālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:7.4: Sā tattha na rajjati, sā tatra nābhiramati.
an7.51:7.5: Sā tattha arattā tatra anabhiratā bahiddhā purisindriyaṃ na manasi karoti—
an7.51:7.6: purisakuttaṃ purisākappaṃ purisavidhaṃ purisacchandaṃ purisassaraṃ purisālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:7.7: Sā tattha na rajjati, tatra nābhiramati.
an7.51:7.8: Sā tattha arattā tatra anabhiratā bahiddhā saṃyogaṃ nākaṅkhati.
an7.51:7.9: Yañcassā saṃyogapaccayā uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ tañca nākaṅkhati.
an7.51:7.10: Itthatte, bhikkhave, anabhiratā sattā purisesu visaṃyogaṃ gatā.
an7.51:7.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, itthī itthattaṃ ativattati.
an7.51:8.1: Puriso, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ purisindriyaṃ na manasi karoti—
an7.51:8.2: purisakuttaṃ purisākappaṃ purisavidhaṃ purisacchandaṃ purisassaraṃ purisālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:8.3: So tattha na rajjati, so tatra nābhiramati.
an7.51:8.4: So tattha aratto tatra anabhirato bahiddhā itthindriyaṃ na manasi karoti—
an7.51:8.5: itthikuttaṃ itthākappaṃ itthividhaṃ itthicchandaṃ itthissaraṃ itthālaṅkāraṃ.
an7.51:8.6: So tattha na rajjati, tatra nābhiramati.
an7.51:8.7: So tattha aratto tatra anabhirato bahiddhā saṃyogaṃ nākaṅkhati.
an7.51:8.8: Yañcassa saṃyogapaccayā uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ tañca nākaṅkhati.
an7.51:8.9: Purisatte, bhikkhave, anabhiratā sattā itthīsu visaṃyogaṃ gatā.
an7.51:8.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puriso purisattaṃ ativattati.
an7.51:8.12: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saṃyogo visaṃyogo dhammapariyāyo”ti.
